list.cap: 很久很久以前，世界各地的人都一样聪明、一样勇敢，并没有谁天生更厉害。
list.desc_promopt: ancient humans from different continents standing side by side, diverse skin tones and clothing, confident expressions, cinematic lighting, realistic style, documentary photography

list.cap: 真正的差别，不在“人”，而在“环境”。
list.desc_promopt: human silhouette facing vast contrasting environments, forest, desert, grassland, dramatic light and shadow, symbolic composition, cinematic realism

list.cap: 欧亚大陆从很早开始就拥有很多容易驯化的动植物，比如小麦、水稻、牛、马。
list.desc_promopt: Eurasian continent map blended with wheat, rice plants, cattle and horses, natural colors, detailed illustration, educational documentary style

list.cap: 人们能稳定种粮、养动物，就不用天天为吃饭发愁，于是出现了分工：有人专心研究工具、武器、文字和技术。
list.desc_promopt: ancient settled civilization, farmers working fields, livestock nearby, craftsmen forging tools, scholars writing symbols, wide shot, realistic historical scene

list.cap: 时间一长，就积累出了钢铁、火枪和战马。
list.desc_promopt: steel weapons, early muskets, armored war horses, dramatic composition, dark background, historical military realism

list.cap: 而美洲大陆并不是人不行，而是自然条件太不配合。
list.desc_promopt: vast American continent landscape, mountains and dense forests, small human figures struggling in nature, cinematic wide shot

list.cap: 那里能被驯化的大型动物很少，没有马、牛、羊这样的“超级帮手”，农业传播也很慢。
list.desc_promopt: indigenous people farming with limited tools, no large domesticated animals present, scattered farmland, realistic historical illustration

list.cap: 结果是社会更分散，技术积累的速度就被拖慢了。
list.desc_promopt: small isolated villages spread across landscape, lack of large cities, muted colors, slow and quiet atmosphere, documentary realism

list.cap: 还有一个关键因素是病菌。
list.desc_promopt: microscopic view of bacteria and viruses floating over a faded world map, dramatic lighting, scientific visualization style

list.cap: 欧亚人长期和家畜生活在一起，慢慢对天花、麻疹这类疾病产生了免疫力；
list.desc_promopt: ancient Eurasian village, humans living closely with cattle and livestock, subtle glowing shield around people, symbolic realism

list.cap: 但美洲人没有经历过这些病菌。
list.desc_promopt: healthy indigenous American community, peaceful daily life, no visual signs of disease, natural lighting, realistic style

list.cap: 当双方接触时，疾病像看不见的武器一样，先一步击倒了大量美洲人。
list.desc_promopt: first contact between Europeans and indigenous Americans, invisible dark particles in the air, people collapsing, dramatic cinematic scene

list.cap: 所以，不是“为什么美洲人没有征服欧洲”，而是谁更早拿到了枪、马和免疫力。
list.desc_promopt: symbolic composition of gun, horse, and glowing immunity shield, centered on dark background, high contrast, cinematic realism

list.cap: 历史更像一场不公平的比赛：有的人出生就在平坦跑道，有的人一开始就在泥地里。
list.desc_promopt: two runners at different starting lines, one on clean track, one stuck in muddy ground, strong contrast lighting, metaphorical cinematic scene
